metadata.title: CVE-2024-5742 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in GNU Nano that allows a possible privilegeescalation through an insecure temporary file. If Nano is killed whileediting, a file it saves to an emergency file with the permissions of therunning user provides a window of opportunity for attackers to escalateprivileges through a malicious symlink.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nano - 4.8-1ubuntu1.1
nano-tiny - 4.8-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nano package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.8-1ubuntu1.1').
